global_palette.style: front-facing Funko Pop style, chibi, large head, small body, cute but clearly magical, highly readable silhouette, 500x500 px, transparent background

enemies.name: Slime Principiante
enemies.sprite_prompt: Front-facing Funko Pop style chibi slime creature, large round gelatinous body with tiny cute face, semi-transparent purple-blue coloring (#8B5CF6, #3B82F6), small bouncy appearance, friendly but slightly mischievous expression, simple dot eyes and small smile, no arms or legs visible, sitting pose, 500x500px, transparent background, high contrast black outline, single character centered, no text

enemies.name: Goblin Explorador
enemies.sprite_prompt: Front-facing Funko Pop style chibi goblin scout, oversized head with pointed ears, small green body (#16A34A), blue clothing accents (#3B82F6), holding tiny bow, mischievous grin with small fangs, large expressive eyes, spiky hair, 500x500px, transparent background, high contrast black outline, single character centered, no text, cute but cunning appearance

enemies.name: Esqueleto Guerrero
enemies.sprite_prompt: Front-facing Funko Pop style chibi skeleton warrior, large skull head with glowing eye sockets, small bony body, white-gray bones (#F8FAFC, #64748B), tiny sword and shield, friendly skeleton grin, oversized skull proportions, simple bone structure, 500x500px, transparent background, high contrast black outline, single character centered, no text, cute undead appearance

generation_instructions.common_style: front-facing Funko Pop style, chibi, large head, small body, cute but clearly magical, highly readable silhouette, 500x500 px, transparent background
generation_instructions.technical_specs: --transparent_background true, no text, single character, centered, isolated, high contrast outline
generation_instructions.color_guidance: Use provided hex color palettes consistently. For special variants, use the opposite color palette. Maintain high contrast and readability.
generation_instructions.size_specifications: Source sprites: 500x500 PNG with transparent background. In-game scaling: 64x64 (factor 0.128). Collider: radial base 26px at 1080p.

rarity_visual_cues.orange: Impressive size, powerful aura, boss-like presence

prompt_templates.tier_1_enemy: Front-facing Funko Pop style chibi {creature_type}, large head with {head_features}, small {body_type} body, {color_palette} coloring, {expression}, {special_features}, 500x500px, transparent background, high contrast black outline, single character centered, no text, cute {theme} appearance
prompt_templates.tier_2_enemy: Front-facing Funko Pop style chibi {creature_type}, oversized head with {magical_features}, small body with {element} powers, {color_palette} coloring, {personality} expression, {magical_aura}, enhanced details, 500x500px, transparent background, high contrast black outline, single character centered, no text
prompt_templates.boss: Front-facing Funko Pop style chibi {boss_type} boss, large {boss_head_features}, small but imposing body, {boss_colors} coloring, {boss_expression}, {boss_special_effects}, {boss_aura}, menacing but cute appearance, 500x500px, transparent background, high contrast black outline, single character centered, no text
